headline: Eversource Energy Announces Sale of Aquarion Water Company
summary: BOSTON & HARTFORD, Conn., January 27, 2025--Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) ("Eversource") today announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement to sell Aquarion Water Company ("Aquarion") to the Aquarion Water Authority ("AWA"), a quasi-public corporation and political subdivision of the State of Connecticut and a standalone, newly created water authority alongside the South Central Connecticut Regional Water Authority ("RWA"). Subject to certain closing adjustments, the aggregate enterpr
